entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
